summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to adhere to robots.txt rules and warns that an IP address has been rate-limited. It also directs users to the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download for accessing data. Essentially, the bill seems to be aimed at regulating web scraping practices of government datasets and promoting responsible data usage, perhaps to ease economic resources and resources used to serve data.
